nodes.bodyText:
I don't think this is going to be enough, what about the file package list? :-)
It only does:
%dir %{wwwdocroot}/css
%{wwwdocroot}/css/*.css

so neither the uyuni directory or the css files inside will be packaged.
FMPOV you need to add:
%dir %{wwwdocroot}/css/uyuni
%{wwwdocroot}/css/uyuni/*.css
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -109,6 +109,7 @@ jar -cf java-branding.jar -C java/code/src com
 ln -s /srv/www/htdocs/css/bootstrap css/bootstrap
 ln -s /srv/www/htdocs/css/patternfly1 css/patternfly1
 lessc css/spacewalk.less > css/spacewalk.css
+lessc css/uyuni/spacewalk.less > css/uyuni/spacewalk.css

nodes.bodyText:
BTW: do both SUSE Manager and Uyuni require both sets of CSS files at the same time?
Otherwise we should consider packaging those for SUSE Manager when OS is SLE, and those for Uyuni when OS is openSUSE.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -109,6 +109,7 @@ jar -cf java-branding.jar -C java/code/src com
 ln -s /srv/www/htdocs/css/bootstrap css/bootstrap
 ln -s /srv/www/htdocs/css/patternfly1 css/patternfly1
 lessc css/spacewalk.less > css/spacewalk.css
+lessc css/uyuni/spacewalk.less > css/uyuni/spacewalk.css
